alert.note: Alert for Pulaski; White (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 4:46AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of White and Pulaski Counties through 515 AM EDT... At 445 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Medaryville to near Remington. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Medaryville around 450 AM EDT. Winamac and Monon around 505 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Monticello. This includes Interstate 65 between mile markers 192 and 198. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
